content: The Dark-faced Overlord isn't a miniboss, but he does have a lot of health to chip away at. You'll have to repeatedly thwack at his legs while avoiding various stomps or swings with his hellfire arms that can burn you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road'.
The content is as follows:
The Dark-faced Overlord isn't a miniboss, but he does have a lot of health to chip away at. You'll have to repeatedly thwack at his legs while avoiding various stomps or swings with his hellfire arms that can burn you.
